programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKResonate.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; frequency and amplitude of STKResonate have no effect
kv2 = p4 ;pole radii kv1 line 100, p3, 0 ;resonance freq + notch freq kv3 = kv1 asig STKResonate 1, 1, 2, kv1, 4, kv2, 1, 10, 11, kv3, 128, 100 asig = asig * .3 ;too loud outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 1 0 i 1 + . > i 1 + . > i 1 + . > i 1 + . 120 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
